column4: Hey can I login to a second user account on my system whilst still leaving the programs on the user account I was originally using up and running? How would I do this?
logoff (don't reboot) and login again as diff. user
won't that end all the programs I was running before I logged off.
multiple users can do different tasked at the same time, only restricted by ressources, so there is a way, maybe restarting loginmanager from terminal does the trick
